ai.summary: Circular Walk 18 is an easy 4.6 km circular trail in the UK, designed for a relaxed day out. The route is suitable for beginners and families, with gentle gradients and varied scenery including fields, hedgerows, and occasional woodland sections.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily easy-to-follow paths with mixed surfaces, including compact gravel, grass verges, and soft, damp patches after rain. Expect gentle climbs, wide, well-trodden tracks, and occasional gates or stiles.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather and daylight hours before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and dress in layers suitable for changeable UK conditions. Bring water and a light snack. Stay on mapped paths, close gates, and watch for livestock on rural sections. Keep dogs under control and be mindful of other users on shared paths. Carry a map or a charged phone with offline navigation in case of poor signal.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation on phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal; the trail can be done year-round with appropriate clothing and planning.
